content.text: Welcome to my small humble website. My real name is Paul Buetow and I am a full time Site Reliability Engineer managing a few distributed systems at work (in a team). In my spare time I drive buetow.org and also spend my time on system programming tasks.

text.strong: Everything you find here are my private (spare time) projects and are not part of my work at my current Employer.

content.text: If you don't like this website design: I am not a web designer and sometimes less is more.
